Class SignupServiceImpl

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
SignupService
@Service @Validated @Transactional(readOnly=true, propagation=SUPPORTS) public class SignupServiceImpl extends Object implements SignupService
The sign-up service implementation.
